preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored CreateTable for DETOUR_REQUEST as table already exists.

createTable.remarks: Request for a truck to be re-routed through a detour like a payload service (e.g. weigh bridge, oversize gantry) on the way to its destination like a loading tool or processor.

column.name: TRUCK_OID
column.remarks: Reference to truck that this detour request applies to

column.name: DESTINATION_TYPE
column.remarks: Type of detour destination that the truck should go through

column.name: LOAD_STATE
column.remarks: Load state that the truck is required to be in before it can be re-routed to a detour destination
